vlive.korean: [좌우로 움직이며 달리는 숙련자용 기술] 다 어디 있냐? [to drive side to side] Where are you? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [to drive side to side] Where are you?

vlive.korean: 아직 무기의 숙련도가 높지 않아요. He's not skillful at using the tool. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] 파송송 계란탁구?!
vlive.english: He's not skillful at using the tool.

vlive.korean: 여러 숙련되게 쓸수 있는 아이템으로. It's an item you can use in many ways. 듣기 View video VIXX : HYUK이랑 뭐하고 놀까?! [혁 VS 홍빈 요리대결]
vlive.english: It's an item you can use in many ways.

vlive.korean: [제작진이 요리 숙련도+10을 획득하셨습니다] 진짜 맛있어요. [The staff gets +10 for cooking skills] It's really good. 듣기 View video NCT : NCT LIFE 예능 수련회 EP 03
vlive.english: [The staff gets +10 for cooking skills] It's really good.

vlive.korean: [김장에 소질을 보이는 슈가?] 나 약간 숙련자의 손길이 됐어. [Suga shows a talent in kimchi-making?] I think I'm quite skilled. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.35
vlive.english: [Suga shows a talent in kimchi-making?] I think I'm quite skilled.

examples.korean: a skilled engineer / negotiator / craftsman 발음듣기 숙련된 기술자/노련한 협상자/숙련된 공예가 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a skilled engineer / negotiator / craftsman 발음

examples.korean: a skilled driver with quick reactions 발음듣기 재빠른 반응 능력을 지닌 숙련된 운전자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a skilled driver with quick reactions 발음

examples.korean: a need for trained/skilled manpower 발음듣기 훈련된/숙련된 인력에 대한 요구 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a need for trained/skilled manpower 발음

examples.korean: highly successful / skilled / intelligent 발음듣기 크게 성공한/대단히 숙련된/대단히 지적인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
We need skilled workers and technical know-how. 발음듣기 우리에겐 숙련된 노동자들과 기술적 노하우가 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We need skilled workers and technical know-how. 발음
